member.name: T:System.Lazy`2
member.summary: Provides a lazy indirect reference to an object and its associated metadata for use by the Managed Extensibility Framework.
member.typeparam: The type of the object referenced.

member.name: M:System.Lazy`2.#ctor(`1)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified metadata.
member.param: The metadata associated with the referenced object.

member.name: M:System.Lazy`2.#ctor(System.Func{`0},`1)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified metadata that uses the specified function to get the referenced object.
member.param: A function that returns the referenced object.
The metadata associated with the referenced object.

member.name: M:System.Lazy`2.#ctor(`1,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified metadata and thread safety value.
member.param: The metadata associated with the referenced object.
Indicates whether the object that is created will be thread-safe.

member.name: M:System.Lazy`2.#ctor(`1,System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified metadata and thread synchronization mode.
member.param: The metadata associated with the referenced object.

member.name: M:System.Lazy`2.#ctor(System.Func{`0},`1,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified metadata and thread safety value that uses the specified function to get the referenced object.
member.param: A function that returns the referenced object.
The metadata associated with the referenced object.
Indicates whether the object that is created will be thread-safe.

member.name: M:System.Lazy`2.#ctor(System.Func{`0},`1,System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified metadata and thread synchronization mode that uses the specified function to get the referenced object.
member.param: A function that returns the referenced object
The metadata associated with the referenced object.

member.name: P:System.Lazy`2.Metadata
member.summary: Gets the metadata associated with the referenced object.
member.returns: The metadata associated with the referenced object.
